function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact with multiple individuals during data collection or analysis may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among individuals involved in data collection and analysis.","Mitigation":"Implementing remote data collection methods, reducing the number of individuals involved, and using personal protective equipment (PPE) when in close contact.","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools, video conferencing, and PPE.","People":"Individuals involved in data collection and analysis.","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts, and project managers."},{"Description":"Conducting in-person surveys or interviews for data collection may pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases for both data collectors and participants.","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases between data collectors and participants during in-person interactions.","Mitigation":"Utilizing online surveys, virtual interviews, and contactless data collection methods to minimize physical interactions.","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, video conferencing tools, and contactless data collection devices.","People":"Data collectors and survey participants.","Owner":"Research teams, survey administrators, and project coordinators."},{"Description":"Sharing and handling physical documents or materials during the research process may create opportunities for the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the handling and sharing of physical research materials and documents.","Mitigation":"Digitizing documents, utilizing electronic data storage, and minimizing the exchange of physical materials.","Technologies":"Document scanning software, cloud storage solutions, and digital data management systems.","People":"Research teams, document handlers, and participants involved in material exchange.","Owner":"Project managers, research coordinators, and document custodians."}]}
